meanings.definition: The quality or state of being imperturbable.
meanings.sent1: Her imperturbabilities in the face of chaos were truly admirable.
meanings.sent2: His imperturbabilities during the storm calmed everyone around him.
meanings.sent3: The imperturbabilities of the clown made the audience burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The mountain stood with imperturbabilities as the storm raged around it.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's imperturbabilities helped the students focus during the exam.

meanings.definition: The ability to remain calm and composed in difficult situations.
meanings.sent1: The soldier's imperturbabilities in battle earned him respect from his comrades.
meanings.sent2: Her imperturbabilities during the crisis inspired others to stay strong.
meanings.sent3: The imperturbabilities of the chef under pressure amazed the kitchen staff.
meanings.sent4: His imperturbabilities were like a shield against the chaos of the world.
meanings.sent5: The CEO's imperturbabilities in negotiations were key to closing the deal.
